en.title: FusionExcel Sponsored TM-WMC Kelantan International Muay Thai Challenge 2009 Featured in Harian Metro 07th April 2009!
en.content:
FusionExcel sponsored TM-WMC Kelantan International Muay Thai Challenge 2009 was Featured in Harian Metro (Bahasa Malaysia) on 07th April 2009. The event was held from 27th - 29th March 2009 at Stadium Sultan Muhamad, Kota Bahru, Kelantan and attended by 30,000 Muay Thai Boxing Fans. The event was organized by Boxx Events with Telekom Malaysia as the main Sponsor and FusionExcel as the only co-sponsor. The event was supported by the Kelantan Government and many Muay Thai Clubs.

There's a picture of World Champion Boxer Abbas Ahmadi wearing FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant at the Trophy Presentation. Abbas Ahmadi was runner up in the main event. There were 42 boxers who competed. The boxers were from Malaysia, Thailand, France, Sweden, Uzbekistan, Iran, Afghanistan, Poland, Spain, South Africa, Tunisia, England and Turkey.

ABBAS AHMADI’S RECORD IS AS FOLLOWS:

  - WMPO 63.5 kg World Champion, Year 2006-2008.
  - MMA Asia Champion 67.5 kg, Year 2008.
  - PK1 61.5 kg World Champion, Year 2006.

FusionExcel is proud to have a World Champion Sportsman of Abbas's caliber wearing FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant. 
It speaks volumes of FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant. 
 
< Click To Enlarge >
